auditorium

Class SimpleKeyStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • auditorium.SimpleKeyStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IKeyStore

    public class SimpleKeyStore
extends java.lang.Object
implements IKeyStore
    Simple keystore implementation which looks for keys and certificates in a specified directory. Keys are represented by files named nodeid.key and containing an S-expression matching the format expected by Key; similarly, certificate files are named nodeid.cert and contain an S-expression recognized by the constructor for Cert. Keys and Certs are cached internally, so multiple requests for the same key will not result in multiple loads from disk.
    See Also:
    Key, Cert

      • load

        private ASExpression load(java.lang.String file)
                   throws AuditoriumCryptoException
        Loads a file for use in the KeyStore.
        First searches the ROOT_JAR, if it exists.
        Then looks for the path in the filesystem.
        The path itself is derived from _dir (_dir + "/" + file, approximately).
        Parameters:
        file - - The file to load
        Returns:
        An ASExpression representing the file resource
        Throws:
        AuditoriumCryptoException - - Should any exception occur during processing.
